notes.text: NotificationListGroup: Property to show empty groups is added
m.ViewSettingsDialog: AnyWordStartsWith option added for the filter details search
m.ViewSettingsDialog: More options for searching in the filter details page
sap.m.Carousel: Animation to the previous slide is added
sap.m.Carousel: New property for arrows position
sap.m.DatePicker: add specialDates for display in Calendar
sap.m.IconTabBar: Overflow select list implementation
sap.m.LightBox: Initial implementation.
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Mobile touch support enhanced
sap.m.NotificationListItem: The description is correctly displayed
sap.m.NotificationListItem: added hover on all elements that are in notificationLitItem
sap.m.ObjectMarker - Added additional info property
sap.m.Popover: Added ariaLabelledBy association
sap.m.RadioButton: UseEntireWidth property introduced
sap.m.RangeSlider Input fields in the handle tooltips
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Added ariaLabelledBy association
sap.m.Select: add "valueState" property
sap.m.Select: add "valueStateText" property
sap.m.Select: redesign for mobile devices
sap.m.Slider New tooltip added
sap.m.UploadCollection: Upload and Terminate pushbutton can be optionally set to be invisible
sap.m.semantic.SemanticPage: Floating Toolbar Adjustment
sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveSplitter ACC enhancements
Core.events: always set event marks on the native browser event
Icon Tooltip: Prevent using technical names
ThemeCheck: extend timeout to fix custom.css
m.BreadCrumbs: control dropdown handling updated as sap.m.Select no longer has header
m.FacetFilter: Search value is reset each time a facet list is opened
m.FacetFilter: Select all checkbox and facet button text are now consistent in all cases
m.FacetFilterList: On listOpen list has correct parent of FacetFilter
m.FacetFilterList: Select all performance improved
m.Menu: Items now support a tooltip
m.MenuItem: Visible and enabled properties work correctly
m.ViewSettingsCustomItem: Propagates models correctly to it's aggregation customControl
m.ViewSettingsDialog: Filter sub-items can have the same keys when in different parents
sap.m.ActionSelect: Handlers for tab and tab previous key events corrected
sap.m.ActionSheet: Removing and adding back a button labels the button only once
sap.m.ActionSheet: fix clone method BCP: 1680037629
sap.m.ActionSheet: set dynamically button visibility
sap.m.Bar: LeftContent has correct width
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: picker has changed, caused by a change in sap.m.Select
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: wasn't read out properly
sap.m.Carousel enhancement: Reverse the key UP and DOWN
sap.m.CheckBox: first click not used to toggle checkbox selection fixed
sap.m.ComboBox: Keep combobox state after parent control is re-rendered
sap.m.ComboBox: improve dropdown list auto close mechanism
sap.m.ComboBoxTextField: fix value state visualization inside the table cell
sap.m.DatePicker: don't open for 0001.01.01 in IE
sap.m.DatePicker: select date after wrong input - error shown
sap.m.DateTimePicker: Secondary calendar type is read
sap.m.Dialog: Fixed layout when only one content
sap.m.Dialog: Flickering issue on browser zoom level change fixed
sap.m.Dialog: qUnit test fix - vertical scrolling
sap.m.DynamicPage: the check if the scrollbar is needed didn't work in IE
sap.m.DynamicPageHeader: extra tab stop was read by the screen reader
sap.m.FacetFilter: Compact mode now works correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: Search field not focused on mobile
sap.m.GenericTile: Add solid border to GenericTile
sap.m.GenericTile: State handling changed to improve performance by reducing jQuery manipulations
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Upwards direction should not always
sap.m.IconTabBar: Disabled tabs now have aria-disabled=true attribute
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Error is no longer thrown when IconTabHeader doesn't have a parent
sap.m.ImageContent: ARIA label support inside sap.m.GenericTile adapted
sap.m.ImageContent: QUnit test error in Firefox fixed
sap.m.Input: "getValue" method no longer throws an exception
sap.m.Input: The input field in an InputListItem is more recognizable now
sap.m.InputBase: Custom logic for event handling in IE is now limited for input elements only
sap.m.InputBase: Dragging text between two inputs should trigger change event
sap.m.InputBase: Fix error state visualization in table cell
sap.m.LightBox: Close button in Safari is fixed
sap.m.Link: Focus visualization within table cell
sap.m.ListBase: Keep selected items context path correctly.
sap.m.MenuButton: Initial width calculates correctly
sap.m.MenuButton: Type of button is read
sap.m.MessagePage - layout improved
sap.m.MessagePopover: Belize theme adjustments
sap.m.MessagePopover: Internal ListItems should be with type Navigation when there is markupDescription
sap.m.MessagePopover: MessagePopoverItems binding to MessageModel check fixed
sap.m.MessagePopover: Styles for markup description improved
sap.m.MessagePopover: When an item's title is truncated it should have navigation arrow
sap.m.MessagePopoverItem: Type of the MessagePopover should not be 1:1 mapped to the internal ListItem
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Escape internally bad characters
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Picker remains opened when input is empty and it is opened by click or keyboard
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Width of input container should be 100% of there are no items in the tokenizer
sap.m.MultiInput: Token is no longer added twice when choose suggestion row
sap.m.MultiInput: enhance multiline MultiInput expanding behave in layout controls
sap.m.NavContainer - Firefox state problem fixed
sap.m.NotificationListBase: indexOfAggregation returns correct value.
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: Control shadow is corrected Fixes https://github.com/SAP/openui5/issues/1052
sap.m.NotificationListGroup: Groups with 1 item, group buttons are enabled
sap.m.NotificationListItem: "Show more" button issue
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Redundant space removed
sap.m.ObjectAttribute: outline is now completely visible on Internet Explorer.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: ObjectAttribute is verticaly aligned correctly
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Transparent background works in Belize
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Aligned correctly in editable form with mixed content
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Aligned correctly in non editable form
sap.m.ObjectNumber: Unit is aligned correctly
sap.m.ObjectNumber: ariaDescribedBy added
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: destroying aggregated control didn't remove it from the associations
sap.m.Page: FloatingFooter overflow issue
sap.m.Panel: Splitter defined style no longer affects panel content
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: View interval change not reflected
sap.m.Popover: OuterHeight without margins calculated wrong
sap.m.Popover: OuterWidth of the scrollable content is not calced correct in IE
sap.m.Popover: Returned height of a svg parent is wrong
sap.m.Popover: The Popover should be compact if one of its parents is compact
sap.m.QuickView: Page sub title now can have 2 lines in Belize
sap.m.RadioButton: Overflowing label text now has proper ellipsis at the end
sap.m.RangeSlider: Extend Accessibility to support entire range movement
sap.m.RangeSlider: Keyboard range update issue fixed
sap.m.RangeSlider: remove duplicate .exit() method
sap.m.RatingIndicator - clicking is now only possible with left mouse button.
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Binding data and context are correctly transferred to the inner control now
sap.m.SegmentedButton: didn't communicate that it has changed
sap.m.SelectDialog Remove disabling of SearchField on first search
sap.m.SelectDialog: Busy Indicator setter and getter fix
sap.m.Shell - belize support enabled.
sap.m.TabStrip: Scrolls correctly in RTL mode
sap.m.Table - focus outline in IE
sap.m.Table: insufficient contrast of focus outline
sap.m.Tokenizer: Issue with getScrollWidth return value solved
sap.m.Tokenizer: property setting width from API is now fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Busy indicator rendering corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: generic binding function support enabled
sap.m.Wizard - contrast container added for belize_plus
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator: In IE zIndex is returned as a number so we need to parse it
sap.m.WizardProgressNavigator: aria-disabled attribute should not be placed for previous active step
sap.m.semantic.ShareMenu: removed redundant tooltip when in icon+text mode
sap.m.tutorial.walkthrough corrected reuse dialog functionality
walkthrough tutorial :  add only one dependent in step 19
sap.m.Carousel: Bullets in the page indicator are replaced with numbers when there are more than 9 pages in the Carousel.
sap.m.FeedListItem: Text displayed in HTML format
sap.m.FlexBox: Option for non-wrapped flex items added
sap.m.Tree: New control
m.TimePicker: displayFormat ah:mm is supported.
m.ViewSettingsPopover: Header items have correct focus outline
sap.m.AssociativeOverflowToolbar: 'removeContent' threw an exception incorrectly
sap.m.CheckBox: the icon is wrongly positioned in Safari on Mac
sap.m.ComboBox: After selection of an item on a tablet the focus should not be on the input
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tapping on a token in the MultiComboBox throws an exception
sap.m.Dialog: Memory leak is fixed
sap.m.FeedListItem: Text selection on mobile devices enabled
sap.m.FlexBoxStylingHelper: Don't treat 0 as false
sap.m.GenericTile: Issue of TwoByOne frameType with two tile contents fixed
sap.m.GenericTile: Less parameters for Bluecrystal theme updated
sap.m.IconTab: Improved documentation
sap.m.IconTabBar: Disabled filters doesn't have "pointer" cursor any more
sap.m.IconTabBar: Jaws announce "selected" just on selected tab
sap.m.InputBase: Fixed un-escaped HTML tags in documentation
sap.m.InputBase: reset dom update flag when value doesn't change
sap.m.InputMask: aligned ValueState with InputBase decoupling of ValueStateMessage
sap.m.MultiComboBox: QUnit no longer freezes on IE
sap.m.MultiInput: Initial tokens rendering is now ok
sap.m.NavContainer - transition queue bug fixed
sap.m.NavContainer: didn't access _mFocusObject safely
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Truncation on control resize fixed.
sap.m.ObjectListItem: Rendered correctly now
sap.m.OverflowToolbar - destroying a control in the overflow area now possible
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Days are read
sap.m.Popover: Popover is now attached to the control openBy
sap.m.ProgressIndicator: border values caused visual issues
sap.m.QuickViewPage: Destroying control doesn't lead to memory leak any more
sap.m.RangeSlider: onBeforeRendering code optimisations
sap.m.SearchField: Memory leak is fixed
sap.m.SegmentedButton: didn't fire event in select mode
sap.m.TileContainer: Paging updated correctly
changes-1.42.json: remove duplicates
sap.m.Dialog: Workaround positioning issue of footer in Chrome
FlexBox.less: invalid semicolon removed
TimePicker: use type 'int' for integer properties, not 'integer'
qUnit: Remove or refactor theme dependent unit tests
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: discard invisible link when rendering the control
sap.m.Button: focus didn't have enough contrast in active toolbar contest
sap.m.ComboBox: Change event is fired after SelectionChange on tablet
sap.m.ComboBox: Loosing focus  on iPad fixed
sap.m.DatePicker: keyboard support wrong if different calendarType used
sap.m.Dialog: Width when RTL mode is on fixed
sap.m.FacetFilter: grouping functionality is fully supported
sap.m.FlexBox: Fixed bugs in rendering of layout data
sap.m.GenericTile: Hindi texts in header improved
sap.m.IconTabBar: Tabs text are not clipped any more
sap.m.Input: Suggestion popup is now closing correctly
sap.m.Input: Suggestions are now correct when the input is in a list
sap.m.Input: Suggestions are now not open accidentally
sap.m.Input: maxLength now works correctly with composed characters
sap.m.LightBox: Error handling when picture is missing fixed.
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Container size is now calculated correctly
sap.m.NotificationListItem: Truncation when Show More/Less button is pressed fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Layouting recatored with flexbox
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Overstyling of the RadioButtons removed
sap.m.Slider/RangeSlider Tooltip size in Cozy mode
sap.m.Table: Should sync aria-labelled by associations of the cells when columns shown as pop-in.
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Selection remembering fixed
sap.m.Text: Text is not unnecessary split in 2 lines
m.ProgressIndicator: displayValue visibility at hundred percent fixed
sap.m.Carousel:  Nested carousels are now working correctly
sap.m.Menu: Destroys removed items correctly
sap.m.ObjectIdentifier: margin inside table + cleanup selectors
sap.m.ObjectMarker: LockedBy type localized correctly
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Truncates when used inside Table
sap.m.Select: adjust the width of the field on layout changes
sap.m.Select: implement .propagateMessages() and .refreshDataState()
sap.m.TabContainer: showAddNewButton property state preserved correctly
sap.m.Text: check for text node enhanced
sap.m.TimePicker: Works correctly on combi device
sap.m.Token: Border type is changed for Internet Explorer due to visual issues
sap.m.Tokenizer: when is editable true non-editable Tokens cannot be deleted
